languages.text: {n}Тело здоровяка пересекают уродливые толстые шрамы, будто его сложили из множества кусков. Мышцы непропорционально вздуты, в них утоплено множество причудливых аугментов, которые, словно провода, оплетают натянутые сухожилия. Обнаженный от плоти хребет скован стальной хваткой спинального транспланта, а лицо скрыто черным шлемом.{/n}

{n}The hulk's body is criss-crossed by thick ugly scars as if someone stitched it together from different pieces. Its huge muscles are disproportionately swollen and riddled with peculiar wire-like augmetics running under the skin. Its backbone has been stripped of flesh and encased in the steely grip of a spinal transplant, and its face is hidden by a black helmet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Тело здоровяка пересекают уродливые толстые шрамы, будто его сложили из множества кусков. Мышцы непропорционально вздуты, в них утоплено множество причудливых аугментов, которые, словно провода, оплетают натянутые сухожилия. Обнаженный от плоти хребет скован стальной хваткой спинального транспланта, а лицо скрыто черным шлемом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The hulk's body is criss-crossed by thick ugly scars as if someone stitched him from different pieces. Its huge muscles are disproportionately swollen and riddled with peculiar wire-like augments running under the skin. The backbone was freed from flesh and encased in the steely grip of the spinal transplant, and the face hidden by a black helm.{/n}

languages.text: {n}その巨体には、まるで誰かが彼を縫い合わせたかのような、太く醜い傷跡が十字に刻まれている。その巨大な筋肉は不釣り合いに膨張し、皮膚の下を走る針金のような独特のオーグメティックがびっしりと並んでいる。背骨は肉から剥がれており、脊椎移植の鋼鉄のグリップに包まれ、顔は黒いヘルメットで隠されている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hulk's body is criss-crossed by thick ugly scars as if someone stitched it together from different pieces. Its huge muscles are disproportionately swollen and riddled with peculiar wire-like augmetics running under the skin. Its backbone has been stripped of flesh and encased in the steely grip of a spinal transplant, and its face is hidden by a black helmet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その巨体には、まるで誰かが彼を縫い合わせたかのような、太く醜い傷跡が十字に刻まれている。その巨大な筋肉は不釣り合いに膨張し、皮膚の下を走る針金のような独特のオーグメティックがびっしりと並んでいる。背骨は肉から離れており、脊椎移植の鋼鉄のグリップに包まれ、顔は黒いヘルメットで隠されている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}这只巨怪的身体上，无数丑陋的伤疤纵横交错，看起来就像是由各种各样的肢体缝合而成。它硕大的肌肉不成比例地肿胀，皮肤下面布满了古怪的金属丝状植入物。它的脊椎从肉体中拆了出来，包裹在带有脊髓的硬化骨架之中，面部藏在黑色的头盔之下。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hulk's body is criss-crossed by thick ugly scars as if someone stitched it together from different pieces. Its huge muscles are disproportionately swollen and riddled with peculiar wire-like augmetics running under the skin. Its backbone has been stripped of flesh and encased in the steely grip of a spinal transplant, and its face is hidden by a black helmet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这只巨怪的身体上，无数丑陋的伤疤纵横交错，看起来就像是由各种各样的肢体缝合而成。它硕大的肌肉不成比例地肿胀，皮肤下面布满了古怪的金属丝状植入物。它的脊椎从肉体中拆了出来，包裹移植了脊髓的的硬化骨骼之中，面部藏在黑色的头盔之下。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El cuerpo del gigante está lleno de cicatrices gruesas y horrorosas, como si alguien lo hubiera cosido a partir de distintas piezas. Sus enormes músculos están desproporcionadamente hinchados y plagados de peculiares auméticos en forma de alambre que se extienden bajo su piel. Su columna vertebral ha sido despojada de carne y está protegida en la férrea sujeción del trasplante vertebral, y su rostro está oculto por un casco negro.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hulk's body is criss-crossed by thick ugly scars as if someone stitched it together from different pieces. Its huge muscles are disproportionately swollen and riddled with peculiar wire-like augmetics running under the skin. Its backbone has been stripped of flesh and encased in the steely grip of a spinal transplant, and its face is hidden by a black helmet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El cuerpo del gigante está lleno de cicatrices gruesas y horrorosas, como si alguien lo hubiera cosido a partir de distintas piezas. Sus enormes músculos están desproporcionadamente hinchados y plagados de peculiares auméticos en forma de alambre que se extienden bajo su piel. Su columna vertebral se ha sido liberado de la carne y está protegida en la férrea sujeción del trasplante vertebral, y su rostro está oculto por un casco negro.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Körper des Riesen ist von dicken, hässlichen Narben übersät, als hätte ihn jemand aus verschiedenen Teilen zusammengeflickt. Seine riesigen Muskeln sind völlig unverhältnismäßig aufgeblasen und durchzogen von merkwürdigen drahtähnlichen Augmentationen, die unter der Haut verlaufen. Sein Rückgrat wurde vom Fleisch befreit und in die stählerne Umklammerung der Rückenmarktransplantation eingeschlossen, das Gesicht ist hinter einem schwarzen Helm versteckt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hulk's body is criss-crossed by thick ugly scars as if someone stitched it together from different pieces. Its huge muscles are disproportionately swollen and riddled with peculiar wire-like augmetics running under the skin. Its backbone has been stripped of flesh and encased in the steely grip of a spinal transplant, and its face is hidden by a black helmet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Körper des Riesen ist von dicken, hässlichen Narben übersät, als hätte ihn jemand aus verschiedenen Stücken zusammengeflickt. Seine riesigen Muskeln sind völlig unverhältnismäßig aufgeblasen und durchzogen von merkwürdigen drahtähnlichen Augmentationen, die unter der Haut verlaufen. Das Rückgrat wurde vom Fleisch befreit und in die stählerne Umklammerung der Rückenmarktransplantation eingeschlossen, das Gesicht ist hinter einem schwarzen Helm versteckt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le corps du géant est bardé de cicatrices, comme si quelqu'un l'avait assemblé à partir de plusieurs morceaux. Ses énormes muscles sont disproportionnellement gonflés et criblés d'augmétiques dont les câbles viennent s'enfoncer sous sa peau, tandis que sa colonne vertébrale, dépouillée de chair, est enserrée dans un greffon rachidien fait de métal. Son visage, quant à lui, est dissimulé par un casque noir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hulk's body is criss-crossed by thick ugly scars as if someone stitched it together from different pieces. Its huge muscles are disproportionately swollen and riddled with peculiar wire-like augmetics running under the skin. Its backbone has been stripped of flesh and encased in the steely grip of a spinal transplant, and its face is hidden by a black helmet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le corps du géant est bardé de cicatrices, comme si quelqu'un l'avait assemblé à partir de plusieurs morceaux. Ses énormes muscles sont disproportionnellement gonflés et criblés d'augmétiques dont les câbles viennent s'enfoncer sous sa peau, tandis que sa colonne vertébrale, dépouillée de chair, est enserrée dans un greffon rachidien fait de métal. Son visage, quant à lui, est dissimulé par un casque noir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dev gibi yaratığın bedeni, mide bulandıran kalın yara izleriyle çaprazlama kaplanmış. Sanki birisi, farklı parçaları bir araya getirip dikmiş gibi duruyor. Devasa kasları, orantısız bir şekilde şişmiş ve derisinin altından geçen kabloları andıran tuhaf ogmetiklerle dolu. Belkemiğinin üstünde et namına bir şey kalmamış, onun yerine nakledilmiş bir omurganın çelik gibi desteğiyle kaplanmış. Yüzü ise kara bir miğferin ardında saklı.{/n}

Its backbone has been stripped of flesh and encased in the steely grip of a spinal transplant, and its face is hidden by a black helmet.{/n}
